2011-04-05

BtVS: Becoming I / Three things

A nice man... he'll die because of Rules of Buffy # 1: If you’re an extremely nice minor character in Buffy then you’re either a demon or about to die at the hands (or claws, teeth, pincers) of a demon.

I like Whistler - he should have been used more

I liked Kendra, but I don't like how easily Dru "bagged" that slayer.
